### Introduction


```{r, include=FALSE}
df = MIMSunit::conceptual_diagram_data
```


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=2, fig.width=10, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
test = df %>% 
  group_by(.data$NAME) %>%
  group_map(~ MIMSunit::illustrate_signal(.x, title = .y) + theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0.01,-0.2,-0.2), "line")))
gridExtra::grid.arrange(grobs=test, nrow=1)
```
